page.title: 03 Rowley Park, West Stafford.
page.content: Rowley Park is on Highfields Estate,it is owned by Stafford Borough Council.It is about 36 acres and 30 years old.Rowley Park has a lot of facilities like Tennis, Bowls,Golf,Running,Highjump,Longjump, Cricket,Hurdles,Football,Hockey and Rugby,and also a playground for small children. We went to the Park to interview a groundsman who does jobs around the park. We asked him what he thaught of his job.He said that it was good in Summer but bad in Winter.He said that up to 300 people use the park when activities are on,during the week only a few people go.He also told us that they do get vandals but the damage is not serious.
